body.name: finetones Black Dresser 7 Drawer Dresser, 43.3" Black and Gold Dresser with Glass Doors, Gold Dresser Chest of Drawers for Home
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Ideal Home Decoration】Measuring 15.7"D x 43.3''W x 31.4''H, this black dresser with 7 deep drawers (including 3 glass drawers) can help organize much more stuff than a regular dresser. The black and gold dresser makes your house look cleaner and shows the owner's unique aesthetic standard. The black dresser has golden legs with a height of 6.1 inches, which the sweeping robot can easily enter, making it very convenient for cleaning and keeping the home tidy.

【Sophisticated Exterior】With a black glossy surface and gold handles, this black gold dresser exudes a charming modern style and sophistication that perfectly complements any decor style. Its delicate fluted glass drawer enhances its superb aesthetic, adding an elegant touch to your home.

【Ample Storage Space】Each drawer of this black dresser has ample private storage space. The fluted glass drawer transmits light but does not see through. In addition, it is the ideal piece of furniture to reduce clutter and create neat, beautiful and comfortable living conditions for your home, without taking up a lot of space.

【Sturdy & Stable】Superior material gives you a more durable and solid product experience. This dresser also comes with an anti-tilt kit so it can be fixed to the wall. Smooth running drawers provide more convenience.

【Easy Assembly】With detailed instructions and numbered parts and screws, this 7 drawer dresser is easy to install. Please check you have received all the parts. Any issues, please feel free to let us know, and we will reply within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory solution.

The top 3 glass drawer dimension: 13.3"W x 11.6"D x 4.9" H. The bottom 4 drawer dimension: 20.4"W x 13.5" D x 4.9" H. How to get the missing parts or instructions? Just contact the seller via Amazon. We will solve problems you encountered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It may look like I am the first to review so I will try and give as much detail as possible so it could potentially be helpful.First, I kept coming back to this dresser (I call it credenza for my purposes) even though I don’t order items with no reviews. But for the price, the esthetic and the purpose I was using it for, this appeared to be enough checks on my list that I took a chance.First- it was delivered on time. Thank you! I live in an upstairs unit. While the delivery driver didn’t get it upstairs he got it in my building. The box is going to be slightly shorter than my height of 5’5 and it is HEAVY. I was able to pulley it up the stairs but it took me 15 to 20 minutes to get it up by myself and my biceps and quads were burning.Once inside, I opened the box. The box had all parts, no cracks, scratches or damage on all parts. Well packaged and cushioned so they wouldn’t rub and scratch other parts. The instructions are long and had several pages, there are a lot of steps. The instructions did not entail what tools would be needed. I waited to assemble until my dad could come help. It took him around 4 hours to assemble and he used power tools, if you use the tool they give it will probably take longer.Onto the actual product- I love it! It was exactly as pictured minus the glass panels are darker as the drawers on inside are black and not featured is the middle bar on bottom of dresser. See last photo on this review as it will change the look slightly and if you are particular it may or may not be a deal breaker. Very sturdy. The middle bottom leg that adds extra support for the bottom and structure matches the legs.The drawers are deep enough for a single row of shoes but probably not enough room to stack shoes on top of each other unless they are flats, sandals etc. the top drawers pull out 75 percent of the way. They won’t pull out to where they come out, which means if you’ve shoved something in the very back you’ll need to reach your hand in to find it. It fits what I wanted. Top drawers hold small purses, plenty of space for sunglasses and accessories. I even was able to Stowe away my big tote bag I use twice a week. Hope the review helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
reviews.reviewText: 0/10 do not recommend!!!! The material is VERY cheap and will break! I expected more for $162.00!The instructions are very confusing and it took wayyyy to long to put together!!! DO NOT BUY THIS!
